
	\documentclass[]{standalone}

	\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
	\usepackage[spanish]{babel}

	\usepackage{tikz}
	\usetikzlibrary{matrix,positioning}

	\begin{document}
		\scalebox{2.5}{
			\begin{tikzpicture}
				\matrix[
	matrix of nodes,
	ampersand replacement=\&,
	column sep=120,row sep=40,
	nodes={
	draw,
		shape=circle,
		inner sep=0,minimum size=4,
		fill=black
	}
] (grid) {
	{} \& {}\\
	{} \& {}\\
	{} \& {}\\
	{} \& {}\\
};
\path 	(grid-1-1)	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$00|000$} (grid-1-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$01|101$} (grid-2-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$10|111$} (grid-3-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$11|010$} (grid-4-2)
;\path 	(grid-2-1)	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$00|110$} (grid-1-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$01|011$} (grid-2-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$10|001$} (grid-3-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$11|100$} (grid-4-2)
;\path 	(grid-3-1)	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$00|111$} (grid-1-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$01|010$} (grid-2-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$10|000$} (grid-3-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$11|101$} (grid-4-2)
;\path 	(grid-4-1)	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$00|001$} (grid-1-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$01|100$} (grid-2-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$10|110$} (grid-3-2)
	edge node[pos=0.15,sloped,font=\tiny] {$11|011$} (grid-4-2)
;
\foreach \i/\state in {1/{00},2/{01},3/{10},4/{11}}
{
	\pgfmathtruncatemacro{\nodeIndex}{\i-1}
	\node[left=0.1 of grid-\i-1] {$\psi_{\nodeIndex} = \state$};
}
			\end{tikzpicture}
		}
	\end{document}
